president. Someone close to  Mike Pence  explains that "the people closest to him, the friends and people he knew best from Indiana, wanted to see him come back to Indiana.""  By contrast,  the support for him to run nationally was in large part from leaders of the national conservative movement - who perhaps didn't have the same sway as his longTim Pawlentye supporters.
